StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRssHsCcPro.leList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RecruiterID uniqueidentifier , @SchoolYear int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT hsp.ROWGUID, hs.SCHOOL_CODE, hs.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME , hs.School_Type FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp ON hs.School_Code = hsp.School_Code AND hsp.School_Year = @SchoolYear INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON hsp.Recruiter_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID WHERE rp.rowguid = @RecruiterID AND hs.School_Type <> 'COL' and hs.School_Type <> '4Y' AND hs.DELETED = 'N'
ORDER BY HIGHSCHOOL_NAME
END
